response.original_title: Story of Manger on McNichols: Boldy James and Sterling Toles
response.overview: The Story of the album that took a decade to create featuring Jazz, Hip-hop, Soul, Gospel, and Detroit. Boldy James and Sterling Toles masterpiece Manger on McNichols is told in these in-depth interviews. Producer Sterling Toles shares the story of meeting Boldy James and crafting an orchestra arrangement around the heartfelt story of what led him into street life. The Manger on McNichols album is already acknowledged as one of the most dynamic and creative works of 2020. Introduce yourself to the collaborative brotherhood that created this expression of Detroit Life.
response.tagline: The Story of the album that took a decade to create.
response.title: Story of Manger on McNichols: Boldy James and Sterling Toles
